column7: Introduction to techniques and tools for representing and realizing sustainable design ideas. Using a case study method, students are introduced to digital and analog means of representing concepts, data, and spatial forms. Through hands-on assignments, tutorials, and workshops, students learn basic skills to express ideas graphically and in three dimensions. Prerequisite: ARCH 171 and ARTD 225. Limited to majors.
column9: Prerequisite: ARCH 171 and ARTD 225. Limited to majors.
